basics.name: Addison "Nik" Martin
basics.label: Big Data Architect
basics.summary:
I'm an experienced IT architect and manager with business minded goals. I have an entrepreneurial spirit and love using technology to solve problems and enable people to work smarter. 

Specialties: mobile software development, cloud computing architecture, and design, IT management, IT planning, software design and development, network architecture, ETL, Dev-Ops, REST APIs, database design and administration, web hosting, VOIP system design and implementation, Remote Sensing, Public Safety Software, Electronic Patient Care Reporting software (ePCR).
